post:
Hi everyone,

Quick news from the hard working folks at XVM Labs:

<ul>
<li> We are adding a new plan:
<PRE>
1024 MB DDR3 ECC RAM
15 GB SSD RAID-10
300 GB Bandwidth on GigE
Platform: OpenVZ + KiwiVM
DC: QuadraNet (Los Angeles)
1 IPv4 (max. 4 IPv4)
$9.87 per year
</PRE>
Order at https://xvmlabs.com/

<li> All plans are now available on monthly terms.
</li>
</ul>
Enjoy!
